title: Adventure/Casual/RPG Vol.2 - Music Pack
description: This Pack is designed for Adventure, Platforms, Casual  and RPG games.
longDescription:
This Pack is designed for Adventure, Platforms, Casual and RPG games.


Listen here.


This pack contains 72 files: full tracks, loops, variations and layers;  appropriate for missions, exploration, deep emotions, characters and battles. 


All you need for interactive game music.



(Check out Adventure/Casual/RPG Vol.1)
